title: Exploring the inorganic perovskite materials Mg<sub>3</sub>SbX<sub>3</sub> (Where, X=I, Br, Cl and F) through the perspective of density functional theory: Adjustment of physical characteristics as consequence of strain
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20
